description: This file defines the AuthService class, which manages authentication-related API calls such as register, login, and logout, using the Dio HTTP client. It interacts with the AuthState to persist tokens and user information, providing a key service component in the authentication flow of a Flutter mobile app.

classes.name: AuthService
classes.description: A service class providing methods for user registration, login, and logout by communicating with backend APIs and managing authentication state.

methods.name: register
methods.description: Registers a new user with email, password, and name, then attempts to login upon success.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Authenticates a user with email and password, storing the received token and user data.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears authentication data, logging out the user.
